statement_text: In Colorado, which has seen an especially severe outbreak among dairy farms and several of the roughly dozen cases of infection in humans, Gov. Jared Polis' office dispatched its lobbyist at Squire Patton Boggs to engage with HHS and the Agriculture Department on the outbreak.
